name: Avoid George Strategy
content:
George chases citizens. When he touches one, it becomes annoyed. You lose if all quiet citizens are gone. Survive 1000 ticks to win. Fire a cigarette (ACTION_USE) at annoyed citizens to calm them back to quiet (+1). Keep distance from George (-1 on contact, kills you). Prioritize calming annoyed citizens before George reaches the remaining quiet ones.

AVAILABLE ACTIONS: {{availableActions}}
